Check if a query returns axis entries

Source: R/query.R
is_axis_query.Rd

Determines whether a query will return axis entries (names) as opposed to scalar values, vectors, or matrices.

Usage

is_axis_query(query)

Arguments

query

Query string or query object

Value

TRUE if the query returns axis entries, FALSE otherwise

Details

This is useful for determining the expected result type of a query before executing it. A query that returns axis entries can be used as a filter for other queries.
